synopsis.text: Meet Speckles, a playful young Tarbosaur who lives happily in the forest with his family. But one day, the vicious Tyrannosaur named One-Eye attacks Speckles' herd, leaving him tragically alone. Speckles later befriends another lonely Tarbosaur named Blue Eyes, and over time they become close companions and start a family together. However, One-Eye returns, threatening Speckles' newfound happiness. This emotional story follows Speckles across decades as he faces hardships like revenge, death, fear and sadness, but also joyful moments of hope, family and triumph over adversity. Set 70 million years ago when dinosaurs ruled the Korean Peninsula, this is an epic tale of love and loss, vengeance and forgiveness between the prehistoric titans Tarbosaurus and Tyrannosaurus.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
